subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Baseball
Accidents and Safety
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Josh Hancock, 29, went 3-3 last year with a 4.09 earned run average. His death was being compared to the death of Cardinals starting pitcher Darryl Kile in June 2002.
snippet: Josh Hancock, 29, went 3-3 last year with a 4.09 earned run average. His death was being compared to the death of Cardinals starting pitcher Darryl Kile in June 2002.
